title: Multi-step Booking Form - Normal Flow
description: Verify the multi-step booking form allows a customer to successfully complete a booking with valid data, including real-time price calculation, address autocompletion, and volume estimation.

steps.description: Navigate to the booking form URL
Select customer type
Enter valid contact information
Select moving service type
Input move details including origin and destination addresses using address autocomplete
Select inventory items and additional services
Verify volume estimation and RUT deduction calculations are updated in real-time
Review summary and pricing details
Confirm and submit booking
Booking is completed successfully with correct price and move details

title: Multi-step Booking Form - Address Autocomplete Edge Case
description: Validate that the address autocomplete handles invalid or incomplete addresses gracefully and provides appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the booking form
Enter partial or incorrectly spelled address into the origin field
Autocomplete suggestions appear relevant and are updated dynamically
Select an invalid address from suggestions or attempt to proceed without selecting
Form displays validation error preventing progression to next step

title: Offer Viewer - Accept Offer and Payment Processing
description: Verify that a customer can view an offer, inspect price breakdown including RUT deductions, accept the offer, and complete payment via integrated payment system.

steps.description: Access the offer viewer page with a valid booking ID
Offer details, timeline visualization, and price breakdown with RUT deductions are displayed accurately
Interact with service selections (e.g., toggle additional services)
Price breakdown updates accordingly in real-time
Click the accept offer button
Complete payment using the direct payment integration (Swish)
Payment is processed successfully and confirmation is shown

title: Offer Viewer - Decline Offer
description: Test that a customer can decline an offer and appropriate system updates occur including status change and notification triggers.

steps.description: Navigate to offer viewer page for a pending offer
Click on the decline offer button
Offer status updates to declined and user receives confirmation
System triggers appropriate workflow notifications to sales/admin teams

title: Post-booking Order Confirmation Page Verification
description: Verify that after booking confirmation, the order confirmation page displays correctly with all required job details, timeline, additional services, and customer support chat functionality.

steps.description: Complete a booking and arrive at the order confirmation page
Order summary with all job details is displayed accurately
Timeline visualization matches booking data
Additional services selected during booking are displayed correctly
Customer support chat widget is accessible and functional

title: Staff App - Phone + OTP Authentication - Success
description: Ensure that staff can log in to the mobile staff app using their phone number and OTP successfully.

steps.description: Open the staff mobile app login screen
Enter a registered phone number
Request OTP and receive it
Enter valid OTP
User is logged in successfully and redirected to the job dashboard

title: Staff App - Phone + OTP Authentication - Invalid OTP
description: Validate that entering an invalid or expired OTP during staff login prevents access and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Open staff app and enter registered phone number
Request OTP
Enter an incorrect OTP
Login is denied and clear error message is shown

title: Staff App - Job Dashboard Filters and Views
description: Test that staff can toggle between card and list views on the job dashboard, and apply filters and searches to find relevant jobs effectively.

steps.description: Login to staff app
Navigate to the job dashboard
Switch between card view and list view
Jobs are displayed correctly in both views
Apply filters for job status and search by job ID or customer name
Filtered and searched jobs match criteria accurately

title: Staff App - Pre-Start Checklist Completion
description: Verify that staff can complete the pre-start checklist modal for jobs, and that completion status is saved and reflected correctly.

steps.description: Open a job from the dashboard
Open the PreStartChecklistModal
Complete all required checklist items
Submit the checklist
Checklist completion is saved and visible in job details

title: Staff App - Photo Documentation Upload
description: Ensure staff members can take photos as part of the photo reminder modal and upload them successfully to Supabase Storage with correct tagging.

steps.description: Start a job and open the PhotoReminderModal
Use device camera to take required photos
Upload photos
Photos appear in job details and are stored securely in Supabase Storage

title: CRM System - Lead Pipeline AI Scoring Accuracy
description: Verify that the AI lead scoring feature assigns scores to leads and that the predicted lead quality accuracy is at least 85%.

steps.description: Access CRM leads module
Create or import multiple leads with known outcome data
Trigger AI lead scoring process
Lead scores are assigned and can be compared against actual lead conversion data
AI scoring accuracy meets or exceeds 85% prediction threshold

title: Automation Workflow - Booking Confirmation Trigger
description: Validate that upon booking confirmation, the automation workflow triggers lead assignment, invoicing, and follow-up email generation without errors.

steps.description: Complete a booking and confirm it
Lead assignment automation assigns correct sales user
Invoice is generated and accessible in CRM finance module
Follow-up email is sent to customer

title: Security - Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that role-based access control prevents unauthorized users from accessing restricted CRM modules and sensitive data.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions
Attempt to access restricted modules like financial reports or staff management
Access is denied and user receives proper error or redirection

title: Security - Input Validation and XSS Protection on Booking Form
description: Test that the booking form input fields validate inputs correctly and protect against cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.

steps.description: Enter malicious XSS payloads into booking form fields such as contact name and addresses
Attempt to submit the form
Form rejects malicious inputs or sanitizes them to prevent script execution

title: PWA Offline Support Functionality
description: Verify that when offline, the PWA service worker caches necessary assets and data allowing staff app and booking form to maintain basic functionality.

steps.description: Load the booking form or staff app online to cache assets
Switch device/network to offline mode
Attempt to navigate the booking form or staff app pages cached
The application loads and allows entry where applicable, queuing data for sync when online

title: Push Notifications - Receipt and Interaction in Staff App
description: Check that push notifications are received by the staff app for job updates and that interacting with notifications navigates to correct screens.

steps.description: Trigger a job status update for a staff user
Staff app receives push notification
Click the push notification
App navigates to the relevant job detail or dashboard screen

title: CRM - Staff Onboarding Workflow Completion
description: Verify that HR staff can complete the staff onboarding workflow including contract generation, asset assignment, and performance tracking setup.

steps.description: Access the staff management module and initiate new employee onboarding
Fill out required information and generate employment contract
Generated contract is accurate and stored in the document module
Assign assets and complete onboarding checklist
Employee record reflects assigned assets and onboarding status

title: AI Operational Route Optimization Accuracy
description: Test that the operational AI module provides route optimization solutions improving estimated travel time and costs, with at least 85% accuracy compared to baseline routes.

steps.description: Import or select multiple jobs scheduled for a day
Request AI to optimize routes for staff assignments
Route suggestions reduce estimated travel time or distance compared to initial assignments
Optimization accuracy meets or exceeds 85% benchmark against historical data

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy and Visualization
description: Verify all analytics and reporting dashboards in the CRM display accurate, real-time data with correct charts and metrics reflecting backend data.

steps.description: Access the business overview and financial metrics dashboard
Displayed key metrics and charts match data from database within acceptable latency
Navigate to staff performance and customer insights dashboards
Charts and tables render correctly with proper legends and updated data

title: Performance - AI Chatbot Response Time
description: Ensure that the AI-powered customer service chatbot responds to queries within 2 seconds, maintaining a smooth user experience.

steps.description: Open the customer service chatbot on booking confirmation or offer viewer page
Send a typical customer query to the chatbot
Chatbot responds within 2 seconds with relevant, context-aware reply
